hero.subtitle: Lightweight Development Service for the Japanese Market
hero.description: Your digital partner for startups, accelerating growth. High cost-performance website plans that save budget with peace of mind—no compromise on results.

whyChooseUs.title: Having These Concerns?
whyChooseUs.subtitle: For SMEs and Individual Business Owners
whyChooseUs.item1: I'm not good at IT, so I want professionals to plan and propose a website.
whyChooseUs.item2: Save time and effort—leave design and operation to our expert team.
whyChooseUs.item3: I want a more personalized website rather than modifying templates.
whyChooseUs.item4: I have an existing website but there are some issues, so I want improvement and optimization.
whyChooseUs.item5: My old site can't meet current business needs, so I want to add functions.

item1.title: High Cost-Performance, Transparent Pricing
item1.description: We understand that every investment you make is crucial. MiniMaxCode provides industry-leading ultra-high cost-performance website solutions at low prices with absolutely no hidden fees, ensuring your budget is used effectively.

item2.title: Personalized Design
item2.description: Based on deep understanding of your business, we use MiniMaxCode's unique AI collaborative development technology, not traditional templates, to customize original designs exclusively for you. Make your digital business card stand out in the competition.

item3.title: Full Device Compatibility
item3.description: In today's era of high mobile device penetration, we ensure your website works perfectly on all devices. Whether it's computers, tablets, or smartphones, your customers will have a smooth and comfortable browsing experience without missing any business opportunities.

item4.title: Lightning-Fast Delivery
item4.description: MiniMaxCode significantly shortens project cycles through modular structure and AI collaborative development models. Website creation can be completed in as fast as 2 days, helping you go online at the fastest speed and seize market opportunities.

item5.title: Pure Experience
item5.description: We promise that your website will be completely your own brand domain. Unlike other template website services, our websites have no third-party advertisements and require no additional fees to remove them. We provide customers with a pure, professional brand experience.

item6.title: Marketing Support
item6.description: Going online is not the end point; marketing is the key. We provide basic SEO strategies and GA4 data analysis setup for free, helping you achieve more precise marketing strategies and continuous growth.

lowPrice.title: Overwhelmingly Low Prices
lowPrice.description: Our company leverages cutting-edge AI development technology to provide customers with the significant advantage of launching high-quality websites at "low cost" and quickly.

ourService.title: MiniMaxCode
ourService.highlight: Industry's lowest price! No additional fees

speed.title: Super Fast - As Quick as 2 Days
speed.description: Professional teams handle everything from website construction to design. Furthermore, we provide comprehensive professional operation services all-in-one, supporting customers to focus on their core business.

ourService.title: MiniMaxCode
ourService.highlight: After consultation, delivery possible in as little as 2 days

transparency.title: Complete Transparency
transparency.description: Setting ourselves apart from conventional templates, we create "custom-made" websites tailored to your business. We craft unique digital business cards that are one-of-a-kind.

sourceCode.description: Get complete source code for +20% of total cost. Full ownership and freedom to modify and extend as needed.

pricing.subtitle: High-quality websites at half the price of competitors

campaign.title: Half Price of Competitor's Quote
campaign.description: Provide an official quote from a competitor, and we will complete the project for 50% of the listed price. Applicability will be confirmed after we review the quote to ensure the scope of work matches our service offerings.

hero.title: Our Process
hero.subtitle: From inquiry to delivery and after-sales support, you can trust us with peace of mind.

step1.title: Quote & Contact
step1.description:
After filling out the quote form, please contact us through the contact form.
We will listen to your requirements and propose the optimal plan and quote that fits your budget.
We welcome consultations and questions as well.

step2.title: Hearing
step2.description:
We will discuss detailed requirements, image, production schedule, and optimal site structure, and send you an invoice.
※ For requests under ¥50,000, we use Google Forms.

step3.title: Contract & Payment
step3.description:
Once you are satisfied with the quote, we will proceed with the contract.
Payment is made in advance.
Please transfer to our designated account. Payment can be split into advance and final payments.

step4.title: Start
step4.description:
Please prepare the content you want to publish (information, text, images, etc.).
Once the content is ready, we will start creating your homepage. We will propose page structure as needed.

step5.title: Review & Revision
step5.description:
Please review the completed content, and we will make revisions as requested.
We will revise as many times as needed until you are satisfied.

step6.title: Delivery & Launch
step6.description:
After final confirmation, we will deliver and launch.
We also support server setup, domain acquisition, and SEO optimization.

step7.title: After-Sales Support
step7.description:
After delivery, we provide reliable support for operation, updates, and maintenance.
Please feel free to consult us anytime if you have any concerns.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Zero initial cost. Safe payment after delivery completion.
cta.note: Payment after delivery completion meeting agreed requirements at contract

descriptions: Optimize the website's basic code structure, keywords, content layout, etc., to help search engines better crawl and understand the website content.
Configure the latest Google Analytics tool GA4 for your website to track and analyze user behavior data such as traffic, user sources, page dwell time, etc.
Configure Google Search Console for your website to monitor website performance in Google search results, discover and resolve indexing issues, submit sitemaps, etc.
Set up small icons (Favicon) displayed on browser tabs and website icons for other platforms (such as mobile home screens) for your website.
Adopt responsive layout so that the website or system can automatically adjust layout and display according to the user's device screen size.
Improve search ranking on Google Maps and strengthen local customer acquisition for location-based businesses.
Professional staff will handle content creation for websites, advertising, social media, and other marketing materials.
Encrypt data communication to provide a secure connection environment for customers and visitors.

step1.title: Quote & Inquiry
step1.description:
After filling out the quote form, please contact us through the inquiry form.
We will listen to your requirements and propose the optimal plan and quote that fits your budget.
We welcome consultations and questions as well.

step2.title: Requirements Hearing
step2.description:
We will discuss detailed requirements, image, production schedule, and optimal site structure.
We can arrange an online meeting to discuss your business and website development plans in detail.
※ For requests under ¥50,000, we use Google Forms.

step3.title: Contract & Payment
step3.description:
Once you are satisfied with the quote, we will proceed with the contract.
Payment is made in advance.
Please transfer to our designated account. Payment can be split into advance and final payments.

step4.title: Project Start
step4.description:
Please prepare the content you want to publish (information, text, images, etc.).
Once the content is ready, we will start creating your homepage. We will propose page structure as needed.

step5.title: Review & Revision
step5.description:
Please review the completed content, and we will make revisions as requested.
We will revise as many times as needed until you are satisfied.

step6.title: Delivery & Launch

mission.title: Our Mission

By leveraging AI technology and global talent, we achieve high-quality services at less than half the conventional price. We aim for a world where every company and individual can build a web presence to succeed in the digital age.

quote.subject: 【Quote Request】Regarding Website Production
quote.message: Please provide a quote for the following content.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

faq2.q: Are there any additional charges for icons and images?
faq2.a: No, we will propose images and icons suitable for your pages from thousands of paid materials at no additional cost. Simple logo and banner creation is also included. Additional fees only apply for specific requirements like custom icons, illustrations, or charts - which we'll always discuss with you beforehand.

faq3.q: Can you handle domain registration as well?
faq3.a: Yes, we can handle that. Please feel free to consult with us.

faq4.q: Can you help with site structure and content creation?
faq4.a: Of course we can. We will search for similar sites and competitor sites, and create content while referencing them within appropriate bounds. Before publication, you can review our content and created materials, and we will make revisions based on your feedback. After final confirmation, we will proceed with publication if there are no issues.

faq6.q: I have a domain. Can you use it for homepage production?
faq6.a: Yes. You can use your existing domain. In that case, please provide us with your domain name and registrar information, and we will arrange the server.

faq9.q: How should I choose a contract plan?
faq9.a: It depends on the amount of information you want to convey. Even a 1-page (BASIC plan) homepage can effectively convey information. However, if you want to 'present company information and recruitment information on separate pages' or 'have multiple businesses, so want to prepare pages by business', we recommend multi-page plans. Please also refer to our production results.

faq10.q: What is the website development process?
faq10.a: The typical development flow is: requirement hearing → planning and structure design → UI/UX design → frontend development → backend development → content input → testing and launch → operation and maintenance. We maintain close communication throughout all stages, emphasizing transparency and speed.

faq11.q: What materials are needed for website development?
faq11.a: Please provide company overview, logo, product/service introduction, brand VI guidelines (if available), content (text), image materials, and any specific information you want to display on the site.

faq12.a: We provide estimates based on comprehensive evaluation of site type, feature complexity, design requirements, development period, etc. We present detailed quotes with clear breakdowns and explain transparent and reasonable pricing.

faq13.q: How long does the development period take?
faq13.a: It varies depending on scale and feature complexity. A typical corporate site takes about X weeks, while e-commerce and complex systems take longer. We will provide an estimated schedule based on your specific requirements.

faq14.q: What types of development do you handle?
faq14.a: MiniMaxCode handles a wide range of custom development including corporate sites, business systems, mini-apps, internal tools, e-commerce sites, from brand promotion to business operations.

faq15.q: Are designs fixed? Can they be customized?
faq15.a: We provide completely custom designs. We propose and create dedicated designs tailored to your brand positioning, industry characteristics, and preferences.

faq16.q: Do you support smartphones and tablets?
faq16.a: All our creations adopt responsive design, providing optimal experience on smartphones, tablets, and PCs.

faq17.q: What basic features are needed for a website? (online consultation, product display, etc.)
faq17.a: Generally includes company introduction, product/service introduction, news/announcements, contact information, inquiry forms, etc. Custom features like product catalogs, e-commerce, and member functions can also be added according to your needs.

faq18.a: Yes. We can add multiple languages such as Japanese, English, and Chinese according to your target market.

faq19.a: We implement measures such as reCAPTCHA and SSL encryption, and also provide server maintenance services. We ensure secure data communication and stable operation.

faq20.q: Can I update content myself after launch?
faq20.a: Yes. We build a CMS (Content Management System) that allows easy updates from the admin panel without technical knowledge.

faq21.q: How are maintenance fees charged and what is included?
faq21.a: Includes server maintenance, regular backups, security updates, emergency troubleshooting, etc. We offer multiple service level maintenance plans. Please contact us for details and pricing.

faq22.q: Do you provide customer acquisition and SEO support after launch?
faq22.a: Yes. We provide digital marketing including SEO optimization, MEO measures, and SNS operation support to enhance search engine visibility and influence.

faq23.a: Yes. We set up Google Analytics (GA4) and Google Search Console to visualize access, user behavior, and search performance.

faq24.a: Yes. Based on contract terms, we can deliver website/system source code after project completion. We support securing intellectual property.

faq25.q: How can I receive technical support when issues occur?
faq25.a: We have a dedicated support window. You can contact us via phone, email, or online tickets for prompt response.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.overview: MiniMaxCode (hereinafter referred to as "the Company") properly protects customers' personal information and handles it based on the following policy.

articles.title: Article 1 (Definition of Personal Information)
articles.content: "Personal information" in this privacy policy refers to information about a living individual that can identify a specific individual, such as name, address, telephone number, and email address.

articles.title: Article 2 (How We Collect Personal Information)
articles.content:
The Company may acquire the following information when receiving inquiries, quote requests, or requests for materials from customers:
	•	Name
	•	Company name/title
	•	Email address
	•	Phone number
	•	Other information necessary for contact and contracts

Additionally, to understand website usage, we may collect information using tools such as cookies, access logs, and Google Analytics.

articles.title: Article 3 (Purpose of Use of Personal Information)
articles.content:
The Company will use the acquired personal information for the following purposes:
	•	Responding to inquiries and communication
	•	Providing services and fulfilling contracts
	•	Issuing quotations and invoices
	•	Providing after-sales support
	•	Improving the website and analyzing access
	•	Providing information and guidance about our services

articles.title: Article 4 (Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties)
articles.content: The Company will not provide personal information to a third party without the prior consent of the individual, except as required by law.

articles.title: Article 5 (Management of Personal Information)
articles.content: The Company will take appropriate security measures to prevent the leakage, loss, or damage of personal information. Personal information that is no longer needed will be promptly discarded or deleted.

articles.title: Article 6 (Disclosure, Correction, and Deletion of Personal Information)
articles.content: If a request for disclosure, correction, or deletion of personal information is made by the individual, we will respond promptly after verifying their identity. Please contact the inquiry desk below for such requests.

articles.title: Article 7 (Use of External Services and Tools)
articles.content:
Our website may use the following external tools for purposes such as access analysis:
	•	Google Analytics (Google Inc.)
Data collected by these services is managed according to the privacy policies of each service provider.

articles.title: Article 8 (Changes to the Privacy Policy)
articles.content: The content of this policy may be changed without notice due to legal revisions or Company policy. The revised privacy policy will take effect at the time it is posted on this website.

articles.title: Article 9 (Contact Information)
articles.content:
For inquiries, consultations, or requests regarding personal information related to this policy, please contact us at the following:

MiniMaxCode
Email: contact@minimaxcode.com
Hours: Weekdays 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM (JST)

contact.title: Questions About Privacy
contact.description: If you have any questions about our handling of personal information, please feel free to contact us.

articles.title: Article 1 (Application)
articles.content: These terms and conditions shall apply to all relationships concerning the use of the website production service (hereinafter referred to as "the Service") provided by MiniMaxCode (hereinafter referred to as "the Company").

articles.title: Article 2 (Contract Formation)
articles.content: A contract shall be formed when the Client agrees to the quotation issued by the Company and these terms, and expresses their intent to accept by email or other means.

articles.title: Article 3 (Fees and Payment Method)
articles.content: The Client shall pay the fees separately determined by the Company for the Service, by the method specified by the Company. The full fee shall be paid after the completion of the deliverables that meet the requirements agreed upon at the time of the contract.

articles.title: Article 4 (Copyright)
articles.content: The copyright of the website produced by the Company shall be transferred to the Client upon full payment of the fee. However, the copyright for some programs or materials created by the Company may be retained by the Company or a third party.

articles.title: Article 5 (Quality Assurance)
articles.content: The Company guarantees the quality of the Service for 30 days after delivery. Minor typographical errors or display issues found within this period will be corrected free of charge. However, specification changes or implementation of additional features at the Client's convenience will incur separate charges.

articles.title: Article 6 (Service Modification and Discontinuation)
articles.content: The Company may, at its own discretion, change the content of the Service or discontinue its provision. The Company shall not be liable for any damages incurred by the Client as a result of this.

articles.title: Article 7 (Disclaimer)
articles.content: The Company shall not be liable for any damages incurred by the Client or a third party through the use of the Service, except in cases of willful misconduct or gross negligence by the Company.

articles.title: Article 8 (Governing Law and Jurisdiction)
articles.content: The interpretation of these terms shall be governed by the laws of Japan. In the event of a dispute concerning the Service, the Tokyo District Court shall be the exclusive jurisdictional court of the first instance.

summary.title: Summary
items: These terms apply to the website production service provided by MiniMaxCode.
A contract is formed when the client accepts the quotation.
The full fee is due upon completion of delivery.
Copyright is transferred to the client upon full payment.
A 30-day quality assurance period is provided after delivery.
The Company reserves the right to change or discontinue the service without notice.
These terms are governed by Japanese law, with the Tokyo District Court as the exclusive jurisdiction.

contract.title: Contract Formation:
contract.content: A contract is formed when the client accepts the quotation from our company.

payment.title: Regarding Payment:
payment.content: Payment is due after the completion of delivery. There are no initial costs.

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance:
qualityAssurance.content: We offer free support for minor corrections for 30 days after delivery.

questions.title: Questions About the Terms?
questions.description: If you have any questions regarding the terms of service, please feel free to contact us.

footer.description: High-quality websites at overwhelmingly reasonable prices for startups and SMEs. We offer ultra-fast production, from as little as two days.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.description: Let us provide you with a free, no-obligation quote. We'll help you realize your vision with the best performance and price.
